reviewText: Sign Language Series: Shut Up and Sign #3 - "Cloud Lucky 7"Bob Hiltermann's signing to funny, silly songs makes the whole video go so quick you will be amazed what you can learn in such a short amount of time. The whole series will keep you laughing and wanting them to create an entire library - but alas, there are only 4! Quick, pick them all up and you will have the most fun possible.
Bob is amazing! These videos have really made picking up sign language easy and fun! Can't wait for the next installment!
